timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't it make more sense for this to be a key-value type arrangement? You can do this by creating a new @ResourceArg annotation with name+value and using an array of annotations.
timeline.author: stuartwdouglas

replies.bodyText: Yes, that sounds like a good idea. That way only the values need to be deserialized (if not used as strings). The signature of init() could change to init(Map<String, String> args).
